attributes.action: allow the Staffordshire Anglo Saxon treasure hoard to remain in the Midlands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although London is the capital of Britain. It should not automatically be assumed that it has the right to keep and display finds found in other parts of the country. The Staffordshire hoard was part of the old Saxon Kingdom of Mercia and it ought to remain in the Midlands,logically Birmingham due to its museum facilities.
